Name: Knightmare Tower
About the game: Break through ceilings, rescue princesses and escape boiling lava as you slash your way to the top of the Knightmare Tower! Features: Campaign and Survival modes 10 princesses to rescue, all daughters of the same King (yeah, even that last one) Tons of upgrades, including visually changing armors, swords and boots 1 epic boss battle 70 quests to complete 50+ different monsters to slice up 3 legendary monsters that can be summoned with special horns Giant bombs that blow apart every monsters around you Potions that make you super strong Rideable rockets Soundtrack by HyperDuck Soundworks (Scrolls, Dust: An Elysian Tail) More info on
